name: Nick Bell
bio: I have been developing in JS for 6 years. We use JS heavily at GOFan, and I am excited to be a mentor.

name: NJ Pearman
bio: When I started programming for the web, I avoided JavaScript at all costs.  But many years later, I've seen the light.  I find JavaScript a lot of fun and admire how it is now the most universal language for programming for the web.
